name: TheAtlantic
text: The grim effects of Trump’s wayward whims have turned Americans into a nation of armchair psychologists, struggling to understand the workings of one particular psyche, @megangarber writes: https://t.co/AkDS0gzqvl

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Twitter—and companies like it—are essential to our national dialogue, to our economy, and to our democracy. We need to start treating them that way, and that means requiring them to do a better job on security and breaking them up," @schneierblog writes: https://t.co/FiDHHLYLK8

name: TheAtlantic
text: “We now have the technology to make periods optional.” Menstruation is becoming an elective bodily process, writes @MarionRenault: https://t.co/L3GTXBGe8J

name: TheAtlantic
text: In 2018, John Lewis shared with Vann R. Newkirk II how Martin Luther King Jr. recruited him into the civil-rights movement and what it was like to know the iconic activist. https://t.co/lg05KLTcGK
